name: x-outreach-agent
description: Autonomous UGC creator discovery on X (Twitter), multi-channel outreach via DM + email, and deterministic rate negotiation with configurable guardrails.

entrypoints.name: x_outreach_bootstrap
entrypoints.description: One-shot setup: validate tokens, create AgentMail inbox, register webhooks

entrypoints.name: discover_leads
entrypoints.description: Search X for UGC creators matching campaign criteria (7-day window)

entrypoints.name: plan_outreach
entrypoints.description: Route leads to appropriate channel: X DM (preferred) or email (fallback)

entrypoints.name: send_outreach
entrypoints.description: Send outreach message via X DM or AgentMail

entrypoints.name: ingest_replies_x
entrypoints.description: Poll X DM events for creator replies

entrypoints.name: agentmail_ingest_event
entrypoints.description: Webhook handler for AgentMail message.received events

X_BEARER_TOKEN.description: X API bearer token (read access to search/DM)

X_USER_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: X user OAuth token (for DM operations)

AGENTMAIL_API_KEY.description: AgentMail API key for email outreach

AGENTMAIL_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Webhook secret for AgentMail message events

OPENCLAW_BASE_URL.description: OpenClaw VPS base URL for webhooks

OPENCLAW_HOOK_TOKEN.description: Hook token for OpenClaw callback authentication

REDIS_URL.description: Redis connection URL (optional, for production state persistence)

steps: # Fill in .env with your API keys
# Deploy webhook adapter to accessible URL
# Bootstrap the agent via Lucid entrypoint
Discover → Search X for creators matching criteria
Route → Determine best outreach channel (X DM or email)
Negotiate → Deterministic decision engine with guardrails

economics.revenue: Variable — depends on deal closure rate and deal size
